name: dynamic-deno-server
description: A dynamic Deno proxy server that auto-deploys subdirectories as isolated Deno servers using Linux network namespaces for secure multi-tenant hosting

scripts.push:docker: docker build --platform=linux/amd64 -t pierrecabriere/dynamic-deno-server:$(jq -r .version < package.json) . && docker push pierrecabriere/dynamic-deno-server:$(jq -r .version < package.json)
